name: Trace Silly Particles
desc: Trace amounts of Silly Particles are found in $market, barely warranting extraction.

name: Moderate Silly Particles
desc: A moderate amount of Silly Particles flutter and twirl around the planet. Extraction will still be expensive but viable.

name: Abundant Silly Particles
desc: A great amount of Silly Particles have made $market their home. While extracting them will be expensive, the returns will be equally great.

name: aotd silly particles fix
desc: fix for aotd megaplex, you shouldnt be seeing this
